introduction:
hi i'm büyücü and this is a collection of things i've experienced
 if a game has an ending and no replayability = story game
 otherwise = vibing game
 visual novels are not games
  my ratings are entirely based on credible sources and overall vibes
 sources: it was revealed to me in a dream
 if you disagree with my opinions, i don't really care
 feel free to add me on other platforms
